item.description:
From IMDB: Charlyne Yi embarks on a quest across America to make a documentary about the one subject she doesn't fully understand: Love. Michael Cera becomes the object of her affection. Weaving together reality and fantasy, Paper Heart combines elements of documentary and traditional storytelling to bring a fresh perspective to the modern romance.

As of 8/2, the early returns for Paper Heart are favorable at rottentomatoes.com, as it has a 100% rating there. More about this movie...

<object width="470" height="264"><embed src="http://www.youtube.co... type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="470" height="264" style="margin : 5px ; max-width : 700px ; max-height : 700px"></embed></object>


Meetup details
Time: UPDATE The movie's start time is 7:05, so we'll head into the theater at 7 or until all Yes RSVPs have arrived. If you show up late, you can still find the group after the movie (see info below).

Finding me: Entering the theater, there's a staircase on the right. I'll be waiting on the 2nd floor landing at the top of the stairs in plain view (and out of the mob scene on the 1st floor).

I don't have Meetup, uh, stuff but in deference to the colors I'll be wearing a dark red retro bowling shirt , and you'll be able to reach me @ 617-852-9428 until the movie's start time.

Finding the theater: Map | Directions

After the movie: During the credits let's gather toward the front of theater as people file out. For those who'd like to eat/drink/discuss afterwards, let's head over to The Friendly Toast.
item.how_to_find_us: See meetup details below for how to find me.
item.name: Paper Heart
